name: Lazer Break
description:
Break out of prison by solving puzzles involving lazers... a lot of lazers! Featuring glass, mirrors, pushable crates, pushable mirror crates, electric force fields, prison guards, and of course... lazers!

Controls:

  • A / D - Move Left / Right
  • Space - Jump (Hold to jump higher)
  • Mouse - Aim and shoot lazers
  • Shift - Grab crate
  • R - Reload map (If you get stuck)

Game made by Triatic with additional art from terrag0ne.
